search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for LiveChat (livechat.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for LiveChat is: [https://www.livechat.com/pricing/](https://www.livechat.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: LiveChat® Pricing & Plans | Start For Free | LiveChat.com

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1: LiveChat logo](https://www.livechat.com/lc-powered-by-logo.59e4207fd8afaeef387d20bfdb42958c49652808777bfbc227d1d69247059393.svg)](https://www.livechat.com/)

LiveChat® pricing that suits your needs
---------------------------------------

Free 14-day trial AI-driven features No credit card required

### Starter

Small business

[](https://accounts.livechat.com/signup?source_id=plan_starter_price&source_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.livechat.com%2fpricing%2f&source_type=website)$ 20 /mo

per person billed annually

[Sign up free](https://accounts.livechat.com/signup?source_id=plan_starter_button&source_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.livechat.com%2fpricing%2f&source_type=website)

Your current plan

Key features:

[See all features](https://www.livechat.com/pricing/#Compare-LiveChat-plans)

### Team

Full-time support team

[](https://accounts.livechat.com/signup?source_id=plan_team_price&source_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.livechat.com%2fpricing%2f&source_type=website)$ 41 /mo

per person billed annually

Everything in **Starter**, plus

[See all features](https://www.livechat.com/pricing/#Compare-LiveChat-plans)

### Business

Customer service department

[](https://accounts.livechat.com/signup?source_id=plan_business_price&source_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.livechat.com%2fpricing%2f&source_type=website)$ 59 /mo

per person billed annually

Everything in **Team**, plus

[See all features](https://www.livechat.com/pricing/#Compare-LiveChat-plans)

### Enterprise

Global company, global reach

Let's talk
----------

Tell us about yourself and we’ll get back to you shortly.

Everything in **Business**, plus

[See all features](https://www.livechat.com/pricing/#Compare-LiveChat-plans)

![Image 5: LiveChat logo](https://www.livechat.com/pricing/livechat.svg) ![Image 6: ChatBot logo](https://www.livechat.com/pricing/chatbot.svg)

Solve up to 80% of cases with AI chatbots
-----------------------------------------

Add ChatBot for routine tasks. Let agents focus on complex cases.

ChatBot starts at

$ 52 /mo

billed annually

Compare LiveChat® plans
-----------------------

Starter

from $20/mo

Team

from $41/mo

Business

from $59/mo

Enterprise

Let's talk
----------

Tell us about yourself and we’ll get back to you shortly.

![Image 7](https://www.livechat.com/images/sqf/decor-left.svg)

**Pricing** (all prices in USD)

Price / month (billed **annually**)

**$20**

**$41** per person

**$59** per person

----------

![Image 8](https://www.livechat.com/images/sqf/decor-left.svg)

**$24**

**$49** per person

**$69** per person

**Text Intelligence ![Image 9: AI badge](https://www.livechat.com/pricing/ai-badge.svg)**

![Image 10: Image showing a chat with the AI Assistant](https://www.livechat.com/images/pricing/tooltips/one-ai-assistant.png)

### Copilot - AI Assistant

Equipped with knowledge about LiveChat® and Text products, our AI assistant will answer your questions and help you with your daily tasks.

![Image 11](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

![Image 12](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

![Image 13](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

![Image 14](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

![Image 15: Image describing the functionality of Reply suggestions](https://www.livechat.com/images/pricing/tooltips/reply-suggestions.png)

### Reply suggestions

Get reply suggestions from your imported knowledge sources. The number of knowledge sources depends on your plan.

3 sources

10 sources

10 sources

![Image 16: Image describing the functionality of Insights](https://www.livechat.com/images/pricing/tooltips/insights.png)

### Insights

Find the most popular questions and topics on your LiveChat® without having to read through thousands of chats.

![Image 17](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

![Image 18](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

![Image 19](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

![Image 20: Image describing the functionality of Tag suggestions](https://www.livechat.com/images/pricing/tooltips/tag-suggestions.png)

### Tag suggestions

Get one-click tag suggestions during chats based on your previous tagging.

![Image 21](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

### Chat summary

Get the gist of your conversation without reading through the entire transcript with AI chat summary.

![Image 25](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

![Image 26](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

![Image 27: Image describing the functionality of Text enhancement](https://www.livechat.com/images/pricing/tooltips/text-enhancement.png)

### Text enhancement

Enhance your messages with AI editing tools such as rephrasing, summarizing, correcting grammar, and even expanding texts.

![Image 28](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

![Image 29](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-purple.svg)

![Image 30: Image describing the functionality of Sentiment analysis](https://www.livechat.com/images/pricing/tooltips/sentiment-analysis.png)

### Sentiment analysis

Get real-time sentiment analysis during chats to better understand your customers.

early access

**Channels**

### Website

Place a beautiful, highly functional chat widget on your website.

Share a short link to direct visitors straight to the chat page.

### Apple Messages for Business

Let visitors message you directly via the Messages app on iOS and macOS. Connect with 1.5 billion Apple users without leaving the LiveChat® app.

![Image 47](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

![Image 48](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

### SMS

Receive and send text messages directly in the LiveChat® app. Enjoy all the benefits of always being where your customers are.

### Email

Integrate LiveChat® with email marketing software, and include your visitors in email campaigns.

### Instagram

Streamline communication by responding to Instagram messages directly from LiveChat®.

### X (Twitter)

Manage your X conversations directly in LiveChat®.

### WhatsApp

Connect with your customers on the most popular messaging app in the world.

up to **100** visitors

up to **400** visitors

custom

Automatically ask a visitor for their email address if your agents haven’t responded for a specified amount of time.

Transfer an ongoing chat to other agents when in a pinch or when expert advice is needed.

![Image 114](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

![Image 115](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

Intelligent chat distribution between available agents.

![Image 118](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

![Image 119](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

### Manual chat routing

All visitors starting a chat will be queued. Chats can be then picked up manually by agents.

![Image 122](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

![Image 123](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

Save frequently used responses under a shortcut and speed up the conversation.

![Image 126](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

![Image 127](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

![Image 128](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

Add a unique style to your messages with canned responses only you can use.

![Image 129](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

![Image 130](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

![Image 131](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

![Image 139](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

![Image 140](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

Share marketing materials, tutorials, and other files over chat. You can also receive files from visitors.

![Image 142](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

![Image 143](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

Route chats from specific URLs like domain.com/help to your support agents or domain.com/pricing to your sales agents.

![Image 146](https://www.livechat.com/icons/bold/check-circle-blue-200.svg)

Assign tags automatically based on the canned response you use in the chat.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Frequently Asked Questions

Yes, we charge a fee for every user account created, regardless of whether the user is logged in or not.

Yes, in the case of private usage. Check our full [API pricing](https://platform.text.com/api-usage#pricing) for more details. Developing apps for the LiveChat® Marketplace? Enjoy limitless API access!

We accept all major credit cards for our live chat software pricing plans. The subscriptions renew automatically at the end of each billing cycle, ensuring uninterrupted access to our services. All listed prices are in USD. If you're curious about the live chat software cost or the cost of adding live chat to your website, check out our pricing page above for all the details.

Yes, you can use our live chat software on as many websites as you wish. Our live chat pricing plans are designed to be flexible, allowing you to manage multiple sites under a single account. Our live chat software price is set up to suit different levels of usage, and the cost stays the same no matter how many websites you add it to.

You'll pay $52 for one chatbot, and the cost for each agent starts at $41, depending on the live chat pricing plan you select. So, for 10 agents and one chatbot, the total live chat price starts at $462 per month. If you're curious about the overall live chat cost, this gives you a good starting point.

No, ChatBot is a standalone AI. It doesn’t rely on third-party providers like OpenAI, Google Bard, or Bing AI. It operates using its own technology stack to deliver replies immediately and host human-like conversations.

You can invite up to 400 users with the Team and Business plans. Please note that the Starter plan only allows one user. For the Enterprise plan, we can set a custom number of users.

No, we provide the tools for your users. See our [Experts page](https://www.livechat.com/marketplace/experts/) if you need help with staffing your live chat.

Yes, you can get a 15% discount for subscribing for 12 months.

If you are doing business in a state where we are required to collect sales tax, we’ll use your ZIP code to determine the correct tax rate. [Visit our Help Center](https://www.livechat.com/help/sales-tax/) to get more details.

No, there are no additional costs and you won’t be charged anything extra. Rest assured that our live chat pricing is straightforward and transparent, with no hidden fees.

Do you have any other questions? Don’t hesitate to drop us a line on the . We're here to help!

![Image 347: LiveChat customer support agents](https://www.livechat.com/images/pricing/support-heroes.png)

### We are ready 24/7 to answer your question

Any time you need help, you can count on our Support Heroes.  
They are strong, they are fast, and they will help you - no matter the time!

![Image 348: LiveChat customer support agents](https://www.livechat.com/images/pricing/solution-partner-livechat-pricing.png)

### Opening a LiveChat® account for a client?

Become a Solution Partner and set up clients' accounts in no time directly in the Partner App.

[Go to Partner Program](https://partners.livechat.com/solution-program/?utm_source=livechat.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_content=pricing_agency_section)

Pick a pricing plan that is the best fit for your company. Start with the 14-day free trial and join 35,000+ online businesses that already grow with LiveChat®!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is per user and billed annually or monthly. Enterprise tier requires custom quotation.
